Bad.title: What should we have done better?

Start.title: What do we want to start?

Stop.title: What do we want to stop?

Bridge.title: What can we do to overcome the risks?

Abyss.title: What are the risks coming up?

Sunny Skies.title: What positive things are coming up?

Hot Air.title: What are the things pushing us along?

Storm Clouds.title: What problems or obstacles are coming up?

Sandbags.title: What is slowing us down or holding us back?

Drop.title: What do you think the team should drop?

Add.title: What do you think the team should add?

Keep.title: What do you think the team should keep?

Improve.title: What do you think the team should improve?
